item.description:
On suggestion from the Bill Splitter Extraordinare himself, we are going to give Kudeta another run. The location in New Haven is convenient, the decor is gorgeous, and the menu is very diverse.

Also, on Sundays there are more parking options. There is a garage right above the restaurant as well. AND there are many ice cream places in New Haven for after dinner.

Hope you can come!

We last went there on May 17, 2009 and here is a link to that event for more info...
http://sushi.meetup.c...

And here is the website for Kudeta:
http://www.kudetanewh...

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Continuing with the spirit of past favorites...Kudeta!
